name: Razor
description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

skillTalents.name: Steel Fang
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Thực hiện tối đa 4 lần chém liên tiếp.
Trọng Kích
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.

At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Nhảy Dậm
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

upgrades.name: Sát Thương Trọng Kích Tuần Hoàn
Sát Thương Trọng Kích Lần Cuối
Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Thời Gian Kéo Dài Tối Đa
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Claw and Thunder
skillTalents.description:
Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his Lupical.
Nhấn
Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Lôi DMG to enemies in front of Razor.

Upon striking an enemy, Razor will gain an Lôi Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.

Razor can have up to 3 Lôi Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Lôi Sigil refreshes their Thời Gian Kéo Dài.
Nhấn Giữ
Gathers Lôi energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Lôi DMG, and clears all of Razor's Lôi Sigils.

Each Lôi Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

upgrades.name: Lôi Sigil Thời Gian Kéo Dài

skillTalents.name: Lightning Fang
skillTalents.description:
Summons the Wolf Within which deals Lôi DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Lôi Sigils, which will be converted into elemental energy for him.

The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's Thời Gian Kéo Dài.
The Wolf Within

Strikes alongside Razor's Tấn công thườngs, dealing Lôi DMG.
Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Lôi RES.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Lôi-Charged status.
Disables Razor's Trọng Kíchs.

The effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.

When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the Thời Gian Kéo Dài remaining on this skill.

passiveTalents.name: Awakening
passiveTalents.description:
Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%.
Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passiveTalents.name: Hunger
passiveTalents.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

passiveTalents.name: Wolvensprint
passiveTalents.description: Decreases all party member's sprinting Stamina Consumption by 20%.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.description: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description:
Every 10s, Razor's Kiếm Đơn charges up, causing the next Tấn công thường to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Lôi DMG.
When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Lôi Sigil for Claw and Thunder.
